sentences.sContent: The retail value would be around $500.
Retail sales fell by 1.3% in January.
...The retail giant said the poor financial performance this year has pushed it to begin implementing $400 million in cost-cutting measures...
...That relative strength would be consistent with what was seen in the wider retail industry during early part of the holiday season...
...retail and entertainment -especially when combined with improved infra structure for cyclists and public transit-makes them appeal to a more affluent demographic...
...a retail executive from a well-known chain admitted to TIME...
...characteristics associated with modern consumer culture mean produce is often wasted through retail and customer behaviour...
